h2_title: Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud are a pair of Yaoguai Chiefs you'll fight before you reach The Emerald Hall in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second duo of chiefs you'll fight in Chapter 5 and they'll try a number of tricks to disappear right before your eyes.
## Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide

Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud are another duo that will use different elements to fight you. You'll go up against Cloudy Mist first, who is the creature with the staff.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game Black Myth: Wukong, showing a confrontation between the player character and Cloudy Mist, one of the Yaoguai Chiefs. Cloudy Mist, wielding a staff, is engaged in combat, possibly using elemental powers as suggested by the bright light emanating from the staff. This encounter is part of the boss fight guide in Chapter 5, where players face off against Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud before reaching The Emerald Hall. The image serves to illustrate the intensity and strategy involved in this boss fight.
